nodes.text: Jurisdiction is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Night's Promise. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on September 4, 2003 and took the form of a roundtable discussion on the ongoing presence of the Navy of Thaere in the Cularin system. Panel members included representatives from the Navy of Thaere, the Cularin Naval Militia, Senator Lavina Wren, the Almas Academy, and the Office of Peace and Security.
